General.Name: Beijing SunwayWorld Science & Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Beijing SunwayWorld Science & Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, sale, and implementation of application software products. The company offers inspection and testing management platform, data standard platform, customer services platform, data exchange service platform, data acquisition monitoring platform, data analysis platform, mobile application platform, quality management platform, and scientific research management platform. It also provides data standard management platform, data life-cycle management platform, data exchange service platform, data quality management platform, data cleaning platform, and data analysis platform. Further, it provides supply chain management software; check rule engine; big data engine; mobile internet; and microservice architecture products, as well as information technology consulting services. Its products are used in government agencies and other enterprises. The company serves petrochemical, metallurgy, manufacturing, public health, food and drug, tobacco, genetic test, aerospace, real estate, transportation, engineering construction, electric power, coal, medical testing, automobiles and electronics, and health care industries. Beijing SunwayWorld Science & Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Beijing, China.
